actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The kobold swiftblade makes two Scimitar or Hand Crossbow attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d6+4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

bonus_actions.name: Hidden Scurry
bonus_actions.desc: The swiftblade moves up to 15 feet without provoking opportunity attacks, and if it moves into a lightly or heavily obscured area, it takes the Hide action, using its **Stealth** value as the result of the check. If the swiftblade is aware of traps in the area, it can choose if this movement triggers any of them.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The kobold has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, and its Perception is 7 when perceiving by sight.
